QuestData.Title: Providing for the Pack
QuestData.Description:
Even beings of the Shadowlands need to eat. They may not do so quite like your world, but it is similar enough.
The pride's favorite prey is the juvenile cloudfeathers found nearby. Prove to Andira that you are a contributing member of the pride by taking her out to hunt for their next meal.
QuestData.RewardText: Providing for the pride is an important step on your path to earning your loyalty here.
